Body:
certificate = CertificateV2()
certificate.setName(Name(
    '/ndn/site1/KEY/ksk-1416425377094/0123/%FD%00%00%01I%C9%8B'))
certificate.getMetaInfo().setFreshnessPeriod(3600 * 1000.0)
certificate.setContent(PUBLIC_KEY)
certificate.setSignature(self.generateFakeSignature())
self.assertEqual(True, certificate.isValid(fromIsoString('20141111T050000')))
self.assertEqual(True, certificate.isValid(fromIsoString('20141111T060000')))
self.assertEqual(False, certificate.isValid(fromIsoString('20141111T045959')))
self.assertEqual(False, certificate.isValid(fromIsoString('20141111T060001')))
